cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on June 15, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6181, A bill to reaffirm that certain land has been taken into trust for the benefit of the Samish Indian Nation, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 212 (Wednesday, December 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GALLEGO:
H.R. 6181.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H7556]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 431.

title: Samish Indian Nation Land Reaffirmation Act
